summary:
hello im skull19972 and this mod make new 6 horses
1) immortal shadowmere
2) immortal frost
3) ghost horse
4) Blaze
5) immortal Arvark
6) Demonice horse
dont worry it dont interface anything
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone im skull19972 and this is my third mod
 Description : 
this mod add 6 new horses
1) a legendary strong horse who is in ghost form and he is very powerful in fight so he is effective against the enemies 
the ghost horse is very beauti too he have a red eyes and he is verry rapid he have an awesome speed to travel and he don\'t interface anything

2)This mod add also shadowmere as essential
3) it add also frost as essential
shadowmere now can\'t die also frost too and don\'t worry it don\'t interface anything
now you can jump from up throw the mountains and high places with shadowmere and frost and ghost horse but they don\'t die ; they are  very powerful in fight and unlike some horses shadowmere and the ghost horse and frost  is effective in fight so they can help the dovahkiin by killing enemies and they canno\'t die 

4) this add also a new volcan horse named Blaze
5) it also add a skeleton horse
6) finaly it add arvark as essential in my version 2 but it require dawnguard
all those horses have a unique style *
demonice horse and blaze are not created by me ; those two horses is created by other peoples but i maked them essential faster and stronger but you do not need to download the other files because this mod work greatly but if you have been download them before you must overwrite them if you want them essential 

That was my mod number 3
Bye bye everyone im skull19972 and this is my mod number 3 the ghost horse and Immortal shadowmere immortal frost immortal blaze immortal Arvark and the demonice horse

Enjoy!!!!
author: skull19972
